title: Remove the claim that we'll delete `Files.append` in October 2019.
body:
Remove the claim that we'll delete `Files.append` in October 2019.

Just as we didn't delete `TreeTraverser` in https://github.com/google/guava/commit/f827e52534ba44f6796b1c0e69313c757bc0701e, we're aren't going to remove this one. We still encourage people to migrate, but we continue to expect not to remove APIs from Guava, especially non-`@Beta` APIs like this one.

RELNOTES=n/a
